subject: Technology
title: TikTok: The Algorithm That Knows You
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: TikTok: The Algorithm That Knows You.

hook.text: TikTok doesn't need you to follow anyone. Its algorithm figures out what you want to watch faster than you can.

buildup.text: Launched globally in 2018, TikTok's For You Page serves personalized short videos from anyone, not just people you follow.

discovery.text: The algorithm watches everything: how long you pause, what you skip, what you replay. Every second teaches it more about you.

twist.text: TikTok made unknown creators viral overnight. You don't need followers to reach millions, just the right algorithm.

climax.text: TikTok reached one billion users faster than any social platform in history. Its algorithm is its true product.

punchline.text: TikTok skips your friends. It shows what you can't stop watching.

quiz.question: What makes TikTok's algorithm different from earlier social platforms?
options: It only shows videos from your friends
It serves content based on your behavior, not who you follow
